alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Logan; Thomas; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 30 at 11:30AM CDT until September 30 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT... .The combination of south winds gusting to 35 mph and relative humidity falling to around 13 percent will create critical fire weather conditions in the Red Flag Warning area. All outdoor burning should be avoided. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 014, 028, 041, AND 042... The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 2 PM this afternoon to 7 PM MDT this evening. * Affected Area...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 014 Thomas, Fire Weather Zone 028 Logan, Fire Weather Zone 041 Greeley and Fire Weather Zone 042 Wichita. * Timing...2 PM MDT (3 PM CDT) through 7 PM MDT (8 PM CDT). * Winds...South 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 13 percent. * Temperatures...Around 90. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or are imminent. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
